tasks.label: build (Docker)
tasks.command: docker run --rm -t -v $(pwd):/opt/xelement/money-server/ xelement/money-server sh -c 'npm run build'

windows.command: docker run --rm -t -v ${PWD}:/opt/xelement/money-server/ xelement/money-server sh -c 'npm run build'

tasks.label: clean (Docker)
tasks.command: docker run --rm -t -v $(pwd):/opt/xelement/money-server/ xelement/money-server sh -c 'npm run clean'

windows.command: docker run --rm -t -v ${PWD}:/opt/xelement/money-server/ xelement/money-server sh -c 'npm run clean'

tasks.label: watch (Docker)
tasks.command: docker run --rm -i -t -v $(pwd):/opt/xelement/money-server/ xelement/money-server sh -c 'npm run watch'

windows.command: docker run --rm -i -t -v ${PWD}:/opt/xelement/money-server/ xelement/money-server sh -c 'npm run watch'
